title: Fixed hanging bug on Nexus 6
message:
Fixed hanging bug on Nexus 6

When changing font size to fit width of screen, the max font size was
reached but the combined character width never reached the maxWidth, so
an infinite loop was caused. Added an extra condition for when the max
font size was reached

title: Added a few changes to this feature
message:
Added a few changes to this feature

- Replaced if/else statements with switch-case statements
- This feature now works with customised keyboards by first checking if a key
  has been changed to a directional key.
- Paint object for triangles is created in the constructor

title: CORE CODE CHANGE: changing the save_dir did not change the shared_dir, causing a…
